ygData.subject: New Idea.
ygData.msgSnippet: Maybe we are looking in the wrong areas.   I was thinking last night while I was sleeping and having those EQ dreams I often do from playing so much. That
ygData.messageBody:
Maybe we are looking in the wrong areas. I was thinking last night while I
was sleeping and having those EQ dreams I often do from playing so much.
That maybe its a faction issue. I would like to try this but I am a necro
and it would be very difficult and I will do nothing but obtain KOS status
with the Dark reflection.

If I remember right that wizard or merchant or whatever he is in the third
windmill says something about the Eldrich collective. About being a member
or something. Same with the wizard behind the library. And I think Jogle
and his spider are a key to tinkering also. Maybe if someone does the
smaller quests in akanon over and over their faction will get high enough
with some of the surrounding guilds that maybe jogl or that wizard will give
some sort of quest. I believe that maybe its a faction issue. And we
may just be looking in the wrong area. Or something to do that zoo keeper
mentioned in the book. Gimblestein states in his book about the quest he
did with him. Maybe there is some sort of quest to obtain a scroll or third
tinkering book. And what about all those mechanics around akanon they
have to be used for some type of quest or other. Just some ideas.
Let me know what you think or if this has already been discussed. Because
I haven't heard much word from our infiltrator??? So I take it the
infiltration plan isn't going to well.

Shmellbee NuckinFutz (Sillyhood). Povar.
